page.title: 17Housing
page.content: A high proportion of people own their own homes in this area,although almost 50% are council owned or NCB tenancy. There has been no slum clearance in 1985.In fact there has been very little in the area because the area did not see the building of houses when the mining industry was first established.The amount of land allocated means that up to 500 houses could be built in the area.The whole of the land to the east of Hengoed rd. Penpedairheol has been allocated for residential development.The land south of Forest Park has also been allocated for housing.A maximum of about 50 houses are built each year.Therefore there is land available for the next 10 years.Because the houses were built fairly recently they are of a good standard,and improvement grants are not in such demand.
